channel.title: 八方/歧路旅人音乐会（7.28）蓝光版将于12.18发售
channel.description: 八方/歧路旅人音乐会（7.28）蓝光版将于12.18发售

item.title: 八方/歧路旅人音乐会（7.28）蓝光版将于12.18发售[0-50]
item.description:
八方/歧路旅人音乐会（7.28）蓝光版将于12.18发售 Square Enix has announced that the OCTOPATH TRAVELER Break, Boost and Beyond concert, held in Japan on July 28, 2019, will be made into a Blu-ray disc.
The Blu-ray release includes the concert in its entiret and a making-of video with composer Yasunori Nishiki. Pre-orders include a post card, while stocks last.
Pre-orders will begin in Japan in the near future. The Blu-ray is set to launch on December 18, 2019 for 5000 yen + sales tax.
近期即可预订 12.18发售 5000円+税
item.content:encoded:
lemon鱿鱼:
八方/歧路旅人音乐会（7.28）蓝光版将于12.18发售
Square Enix has announced that the OCTOPATH TRAVELER Break, Boost and Beyond concert, held in Japan on July 28, 2019, will be made into a Blu-ray disc.
The Blu-ray release includes the concert in its entiret and a making-of video with composer Yasunori Nishiki. Pre-orders include a post card, while stocks last.
Pre-orders will begin in Japan in the near future. The Blu-ray is set to launch on December 18, 2019 for 5000 yen + sales tax.
近期即可预订 12.18发售 5000円+税

lemon鱿鱼:
好吧果然没有人关心

噂の船:
..我知道你音乐好听 这也太多了吧
我已经买了原版和重编版 现在又搞一个蓝光版 能不能赶紧把二代搞出来
-- 来自 能看大图的 Stage1官方 iOS客户端

lemon鱿鱼:
噂の船 发表于 2019-7-30 10:53
..我知道你音乐好听 这也太多了吧
我已经买了原版和重编版 现在又搞一个蓝光版 能不能赶紧把二代搞出来
这个应该是前天的音乐会的现场视频吧

StevenZeng:
我就想知道他们要出多少碟之后才能放过八方旅人....

华理傻宅:
看推特里参加这演奏会现场有说手游制作中，主机续作企划中
手游内测都过了4个月了怎么还没好
